entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
